actual_description: There is a library officer who will manage the membership processes.
The library management system is software that is designed to manage all the functions of a library.
Along with the membership number, other details on a customer must be kept, such as a name, address, and date of birth.
This system completely automates all your library's activities.
The library management system is software that is designed to manage all the functions of a library.
It helps the librarian maintain the database of new books, the books that members borrow, and their due dates.
There are two types of loan items, language tapes, and books.
Each member has a membership card that shows a unique member number.
Scope
Requirements
An item can be borrowed, reserved, or renewed to extend a current loan.
When a book or language tape is returned to the library, the member who made the reservation will be notified.
A book has a title and author(s).
A member can reserve a loan item not available at the library.
A library issues loan items to members.
The application will allow updating the list of loan items, user registration, lending transactions, and reservations.
A bar code uniquely identifies a loan item.
A language tape has a title language (, Spanish) and level (, beginner).
Library Management System  Purpose
Reservations will be canceled upon borrowing by the member or upon the member's request.
